it.unimi.dsi.law.rank
Class GeneralHyperbolicRank

java.lang.Object
  it.unimi.dsi.law.rank.GeneralHyperbolicRank

public class GeneralHyperbolicRank
extends Object

This class computes the General Hyperbolic Rank as described in “Generalizing PageRank: Damping Functions for Link-Based Ranking Algorithms”, by Ricardo Baeza-Yates, Paolo Boldi, and Carlos Castillo, in Proc. of the 29th ACM SIGIR, pages 308−315, 2006.

Users are warned that convergence speed gets slower and slower as beta approaches zero.

Field Summary

          The parameter β of the algorithm: it must be greater than 1.

Constructor Detail

GeneralHyperbolicRank

public GeneralHyperbolicRank(it.unimi.dsi.webgraph.ImmutableGraph graph,
                             double[] preference,
                             double beta,
                             ProgressLogger pl)
Creates a new TotalRank calculator.

Parameters:
graph - the graph.
preference - the preference vector to be used (null for uniform preference).
beta - the value of beta to be used.
pl - the progress logger to be used during the computation (or null).
